from collections import Counter
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = Counter({i: x for (i, x) in enumerate(list(map(int, input().split())))})
    glist = list(map(int, input().split()))
    g = Counter({i: x for (i, x) in enumerate(glist)})
    gr = Counter({i: x for (i, x) in enumerate(reversed(glist))})
    g.subtract(l)
    gr.subtract(l)
    (f, fl) = g.most_common()[:-2:-1][0]
    (b, bl) = gr.most_common()[:-2:-1][0]
    print('front' if fl >= 0 and bl < 0 else 'back' if bl >= 0 and fl < 0 else 'both' if bl >= 0 and fl >= 0 else 'none')
